description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[A Short Account of the Church, Episcopal Manor ... of Bosbury.] History and Description of the Parish of Bosbury in the Diocese and County of Hereford" Author: BENTLEY, Samuel - Vicar of Bosbury Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10362.f.18."
